message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. I think you'll really love it. Would you like to make an offer on it?
I'm very interested in the product, but $12000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $10500?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I'm afraid $9500 is still a bit below my target. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $9500 and $12000, so I can offer it to you for $10500. What do you think?

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm still a bit below your new offer of $10500. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $10500 and $9800, which would be $10150. Would you be willing to accept that price?

I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm glad we're getting close to a deal. However, I'm still a bit above your latest offer of $10150. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I can offer it to you for $11000. This is as low as I'm willing to go, so I hope we can finalize the deal at this price.

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $11000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to make one final offer of $9500. If you're willing to accept this price, I'd be happy to move forward with the purchase.

I'm sorry, Bob, but I've already made a concession to $11000 and you're now offering $9500, which is even lower than your initial offer. I'm afraid I won't be able to accept this counteroffer. However, I'm willing to give you one last chance to meet me at $11000. If you're not willing to do that, I'll have to consider other options.
I appreciate your time and effort, Alice, but I'm not willing to go any higher than $9500. I'm going to have to pass on this deal and explore other options. Thank you for considering my offer.
